description: Rangers face Morton in Viaplay Cup last 16
title: Rangers face Morton in Viaplay Cup last 16
title_page: Rangers face Morton in Viaplay Cup last 16 - BBC Sport
maintext:
Rangers will face Greenock Morton in the last 16 of the Viaplay Cup.
The Ibrox side, who bypassed the group stage due to their European commitments, will have home advantage for the encounter against the second-tier club.
The tie is due to be played on the weekend of 19/20 August.
